name: Launcher Heroes
description:
Launcher Heroes is the ultimate tactical artillery party game where strategic prowess and explosive weaponry collide. Arm yourself with an arsenal of powerful bombs, rockets, and jetpacks, as you set out to conquer treacherous terrain and topple your rivals off the world's edge. Launcher Heroes promises countless thrills and heart-pounding challenges if you're playing solo or teaming up with friends.

Gamemodes: Whether locally or online, up to 6 players can engage in fierce battles and explore many exhilarating game modes:
  • Strategic Turn Mode: Each move counts, and cunning strategies reign supreme. See who can survive the longest and become the victor.
  • Freeplay Mode: For those seeking an adrenaline-fueled frenzy, the Freeplay mode allows simultaneous movement for all players in online matches.
  • Adventure Mode: Experience unpredictable clashes in Adventure mode, where camaraderie is key. In this mode, you and your allies join forces to face the nefarious Skulloss and safeguard the world of Blastopia from imminent peril. This mode can also be played in local Single-Player.

Are you ready to step into the shoes of the mighty Launcher Heroes and unleash explosive mayhem? Gather your friends, hone your skills, and get ready to knock your opponents off their feet in this explosive gaming experience! The world of Launcher Heroes awaits your heroic feats – embark on this epic journey and leave a trail of victories in your wake!

*Note: Online servers are only located in the US East region.
